【考法 1】 v. 谴责： to declare to be morally wrong or evil
【例】 leaders from all over the world execrated the terrorists responsible for the bomb blast
【近】 anathematize, censure, decry, denounce, reprehend, reprobate
【反】 bless 保佑
【考法 2】 v. 痛恨： to dislike strongly
【例】 execrates anyone who would physically abuse children or animals
【近】 abhor, abominate, despise, detest厌恶；憎恨, loathe讨厌，厌恶
【反】 love 爱
【记】" from ex- "out of, from," + sacrare "to devote to" = "to devote off or away; to curse."
